item.description:
Let’s go cheer our home team on!

Patriot’s vs. Buffalo

The Winner’s Circle has it all: plenty of dinning tables and 3 wide screen TV’s to watch the games on.  Plenty of small TV’s at each table and in each room, they also have pool tables, dart boards, arcade games, keno, scratch tickets and a great menu.  So come on out and enjoy the company and the game!

Not into Football but want to come anyways?  Feel free there is so much to do at the Winners Circle you can find something to do to pass the time,.

Where: Winners Circle in Salisbury, MA

Parking: Plenty of it in their parking lot.

Check out their website @ http://www.winnerscirclema.com/

 

Hope to see you at the Winners Circle!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come in and find us at the tables to the right of the bar.
item.name: Are you ready for some football????
